rows.label: tev001291_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh, hey, [ST:playername ]!
You here to test some sort of new weapon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0002
rows.name:
I was actually just wondering if I could upgrade the
flight module's intake and exhaust systems a bit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0003
rows.name:
I was just wondering if I could maybe make the flight
module's energy systems work a little more efficiently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0004
rows.name:
I had a chance to talk it over with a mechanic from
one of the arms manufacturers, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0005
rows.name:
And man, the people working behind the scenes to
develop state-of-the-art weapons sure do have a
lot of interesting things to say![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0006
rows.name:
You wouldn't BELIEVE how rapidly technology
is advancing here in New LA while we're out
on deployment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_JNK0010
rows.name: Sympathize

rows.label: tev001291_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Lin if she'd prefer to be a full-time mechanic.

rows.label: tev001291_JNK0020
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: tev001291_SEL0021
rows.name:
Ask Lin if it wouldn't be better for
her to focus on BLADE missions.

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0007
rows.name:
Well, I guess I do get a teeeensy bit jealous of people
who get to work with new technologies like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0008
rows.name:
But our work as BLADEs is equally important for
weapons development, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0009
rows.name:
Like, remember when we saw that auravis flying
through the sky during a mission?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0010
rows.name:
I saw the way it stayed aloft while gliding, and that
gave me the idea for a new tail assembly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0011
rows.name:
The whole thing kind of blew me away.
It made me glad I joined BLADE, that's for sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0012
rows.name:
Buuuut, I know you asked because you worry about
me. And I appreciate it, [ST:playername ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0013
rows.name:
Focus on BLADE missions? Oh...
I thought I was doing okay out there, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0014
rows.name: Can you really tell I'm that distracted?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0015
rows.name:
I always INTEND to give things my full attention,
but sometimes I find myself kind of...drifting off
in the middle of indigen battles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0016
rows.name:
Like, I find myself watching the way they move,
and then analyzing their musculature, and thinking
about how I could incorporate that into a Skell...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0017
rows.name:
Anyway, thanks for the honest pep talk.
I appreciate it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0018
rows.name:
I wouldn't be able to continue inventing things the
way I do if I didn't have you and Elma watching
out for me all the time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_JNK0030
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: tev001291_SEL0031
rows.name: Say it's all due to her hard work.

rows.label: tev001291_JNK0040
rows.name: Correct

rows.label: tev001291_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Lin that she forgot about Doug.

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0019
rows.name:
Aw, [ST:playername ]. You're so sweet.
You've always been like a [ST:gender p1=father p2=mother ] to me, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0020
rows.name:
Aw, [ST:playername ]. You're so sweet.
You've always been like a [ST:gender p1=father p2=mother ] to me, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0021
rows.name:
I'm gonna keep working my butt off to invent cool stuff
that'll help all of us, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0022
rows.name:
And yeah, I know that booster engine I was testing
kinda...exploded, but I'm not about to give up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0023
rows.name:
In fact, I'd be honored if you'd join me as my
co-test pilot! What do you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_JNK0050
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: tev001291_SEL0051
rows.name: Nod and smile through fear-clenched teeth.

rows.label: tev001291_JNK0060
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: tev001291_SEL0061
rows.name: Refuse in no uncertain terms.

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0024
rows.name:
Really? That's great! There are so many things I want
to work on, and Doug can't possibly handle 'em all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0025
rows.name:
Now that I've got you to help me test, I can double
down on making all those prototypes I've been itching
to make! Thank you so much![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0026
rows.name:
Er, you're shaking, [ST:playername ].
And your face is all red. Is everything okay?
Are you feeling all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0027
rows.name:
Well, maybe it's best if you're not my co-test pilot.
I wouldn't want you to do it if you're sick anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0028
rows.name:
I guess I'll just have to keep counting on
good ol' Doug![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0029
rows.name: Oh man, you're right! I almost forgot![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0030
rows.name:
The whole reason I've been able to pull off all these
tests is because Doug's built so tough! Definitely the
most pliable guy I know...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0031
rows.name:
The next test flight does look like it's gonna be a
doozy, though...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001291_MSG0032
rows.name:
Still, I'm sure he can handle it. I can always count on
Doug to keep at it until I get it right, no matter how
many dozens of attempts it takes![ST:wait ]
